Title: A Boy from Calabria
Writer: Demetrio Casile (previous screenplay), Francesca Comencini, Luigi Comencini, Ugo Pirro
Actors: Gian Maria Volontè, Diego Abatantuono, Thérèse Liotard, Santo Polimeno
Plot: Dad wants his 13-year-old son to work harder and smarter than he himself did; thus justifying the beatings and scoldings given the boy. The boy was also forced to work with some rope manufacturers who worked him like a dog.
